assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.sequence","version":"1.0","templateId":"sequenceTemplate"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ARRANGE THE FOLLOWING SENTENCE

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"கருநாடகம் (கர்நாடகம் , கன்னடம் : ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ) இந்தியாவின் தென் பகுதியில் உள்ள ஒரு மாநிலமாகும்.","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","$$hashKey":"object:3353"},{"text":"மைசூர் மாநிலம் என்று அழைக்கப்பட்டு வந்த இம் மாநிலம் 1973 -இல் கருநாடகம் என்று பெயர் மாற்றம் செய்யப்பட்டது.","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","$$hashKey":"object:3354"}],"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Vertical","name":"ARRANGE THE FOLLOWING SENTENCE ","title":"ARRANGE THE FOLLOWING SENTENCE ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 5","Class 5"],"subject":"Urdu","qlevel":"EASY","category":"mcq"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Vertical","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
assessment_item.name: ARRANGE THE FOLLOWING SENTENCE
